message: Hello everyone! Looking forward to an interesting game with all of you. Since this is just the first public round, I’ll keep things simple—I'm open to working with those who are willing to communicate and strategize. Trust and cooperation will be important early on, but we all know eliminations are inevitable. Let’s see how things unfold! If you’re interested in talking privately, I’d be happy to connect and discuss potential paths forward. Good luck to all!

I'm curious to learn about your approaches and find compatible partners. I value loyalty but understand this is ultimately a competitive game. Looking forward to our conversations!
